name: CollapsibleSideNav
description: CollapsibleSideNav component for side navigation with smooth expand/collapse animation. Shows icons-only when collapsed with tooltip labels.

props.name: items
props.description: Items with id, label, icon, onClick, disabled

examples.title: Basic CollapsibleSideNav

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Tab navigates items, toggle button expands/collapses
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Navigation items with labels announced, collapse state conveyed

whenNotToUse: For mobile navigation (use SideNav with temporary variant)
bestPractices: Provide meaningful icons since they show when collapsed
Use Tooltip labels in collapsed state (built-in)
Persist expanded state in user preferences
commonPatterns: Main application sidebar with Syncrofy branding
